page.title: 06Otley Science & Technology.
page.content: Some shops in Otley now have computers which keep prices on it.In our class the percentage of people with computers is 80% approximately.The Otley By-Pass started being built in 1982 and opened in 1984.Now in many banks they have got a cash point where you put in a credit card,type in your secret number and how much money you want out and then the money comes out of the machine.In the last few years school computers have become more popular for children's education. Videos have become popular in the home as well as in Otley schools.Recently compact disc players are being in Otley.Video cameras have been more popular recently in shops.This is to cut down shoplifting.Teletext T.V's can bring you the latest news. By Richard Glendinning,Richard Harrison and James Bonner.
